dmca.title: [ABUSE] Illegal Rebroadcasting of your station.
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, September 03, 2004 2:50 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Illegal Rebroadcasting of your station.]

For your review.
-- 
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Illegal Rebroadcasting of your station.
Date:         Fri, 3 Sep 2004 08:09:52 -0500
From:         Robert Winkelmann <robert.winkelmann@sbcglobal.net>
To:         <webmaster@wbcn.com>, <TheRock@wbcn.com>, <abuse@theplanet.com>



There is a website/internet radio station located at www.crystalone.net
<http://www.crystalone.net> which is illegally rebroadcasting the WBCN
signal during the Howard Stern Show. It is occuring at this very moment.
This occurs on a daily basis and they are
charging people to listen.

The owner of crystalone.net is identified as:

domain: CRYSTALONE.NET
created: 06-Apr-2004
last-changed: 16-May-2004
registration-expiration: 06-Apr-2005

nserver: ns1.crystaldawn.net 69.15.63.250
nserver: ns2.crystaldawn.net 69.15.63.250

registrant-firstname: Peter
registrant-lastname: Shelling
registrant-organization: Crystal One Productions
registrant-street1: 451 N Monroe ST
registrant-pcode: 22201
registrant-state: VA
registrant-city: Arlington
registrant-ccode: US
registrant-phone: +1.2324344545
registrant-email: crystaloneproductions@hotmail.com

admin-c-firstname: Peter
admin-c-lastname: Shelling
admin-c-organization: Crystal One Productions
admin-c-street1: 451 N Monroe ST
admin-c-pcode: 22201
admin-c-state: VA
admin-c-city: Arlington
admin-c-ccode: US
admin-c-phone: +1.2324344545
admin-c-email: crystaloneproductions@hotmail.com

The servers illegally broadcasting this signal is located at provider
The Planet (67.18.167.125:8080). A copy of this e-mail has been
forwarded to them
so the appropriate action can be taken.

        
[ CrystalOne Station ]

        
[ Live DJ ]
